name: polaroid2
description: The Polaroid looks slightly faded from age. It's a picture of this house from the street. It looks empty without any trees out front. You wonder when this was taken.

verbInteractions.Eat: That doesn't sound like a good idea.
verbInteractions.Flip: There's a number 5 on the back.
verbInteractions.Examine: The Polaroid looks slightly faded from age. It's a picture of this house from the street. It looks empty without any trees out front. You wonder when this was taken.
verbInteractions.Take: You put the Old Polaroid in your pocket.
verbInteractions.Drop: You set the Old Polaroid down.
